name: homebridge-dingz
author: johannrichard
description: Homebridge Plugin for dingz & myStrom Devices. Implements some (but not all, due to API limitations) functions of a [dingz](https://dingz.ch) Smart Home Device.

scripts.watch: yarn run build && yarn link && nodemon
scripts.prepublishOnly: yarn run lint && yarn run build
scripts.prepare: yarn run lint && yarn run build && yarn run depcheck
scripts.release:nightly: yarn version --prerelease --preid nightly --no-git-tag-version && yarn publish --tag nightly
scripts.release:candidate: yarn version --prerelease --preid rc --no-git-tag-version && yarn publish --tag next
scripts.release:major: yarn run prepare && yarn run changelog -M && git add CHANGELOG.md && yarn version --major && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:minor: yarn run prepare && yarn run changelog -m && git add CHANGELOG.md && yarn version --minor && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:patch: yarn run prepare && yarn run changelog -p && git add CHANGELOG.md && yarn version --patch && git push origin && git push origin --tags
